Begin!

Let's fetch the relevant data.

The data for Bitcoin (BTC) in market BINANCE and base currency USDT for the month of May has been fetched successfully. This data includes daily details for the open, high, low, and close prices along with volume and VWAP (Volume-Weighted Average Price).

Now I'll relay the completed information to the user in an understandable and relevant manner.
